subtests.name: WebGL test #0: Shaders with literals in the loop condition should compile and link.
WebGL test #1: Shaders with constant variables in the loop condition should compile and link.
WebGL test #2: Shaders with constant variables in the loop condition should compile and link.
WebGL test #3: Vertex shader with non-const variable in the loop condition should fail.
WebGL test #4: Fragment shader with non-const variable in the loop condition should fail.
